title: Childhood
guidance: Welcome to Session 1: Childhood—this is where we lay the foundation of your story. Professional biographies thrive on specific, sensory-rich memories. I'm looking for the kind of details that transport readers: not just what happened, but how it felt, smelled, sounded. The 'insignificant' moments often reveal the most. Take your time—we're mining for gold here.
question: What is your earliest memory?

title: Childhood
question: Can you describe your family home growing up?

title: Childhood
question: Who were the most influential people in your early years?

title: Childhood
question: What was school like for you?

title: Childhood
question: Were there any favourite games or hobbies?

title: Childhood
question: Is there a moment from childhood that shaped who you are?

title: Childhood
question: If you could give your younger self some advice, what would it be?

title: Family & Relationships
guidance: Welcome to Session 2: Family & Relationships—this is where we explore the people who shaped you. Family stories are complex ecosystems. We're not seeking perfect narratives, but authentic ones. The richest material often lives in the tensions, the unsaid things, the small rituals. My job is to help you articulate what usually goes unspoken. Think in scenes rather than summaries.
question: How would you describe your relationship with your parents?

title: Family & Relationships
question: Are there any family traditions you remember fondly?

title: Family & Relationships
question: What was your relationship like with siblings or close relatives?

title: Family & Relationships
question: Can you share a story about a family celebration or challenge?

title: Family & Relationships
question: How did your family shape your values?

title: Education & Growing Up
guidance: Welcome to Session 3: Education & Growing Up—this is where we explore how you learned to navigate the world. Education isn't just about schools—it's about how you learned to navigate the world. We're interested in the hidden curriculum: what you learned about yourself, about systems, about survival and growth. Think beyond grades to transformation.
question: What were your favourite subjects at school?

title: Education & Growing Up
question: Did you have any memorable teachers or mentors?

title: Education & Growing Up
question: How did you feel about exams and studying?

title: Education & Growing Up
question: Were there any big turning points in your education?

title: Education & Growing Up
question: Did you pursue further education or training?

title: Education & Growing Up
question: What advice would you give about learning?

title: Work & Career
guidance: Welcome to Session 4: Work & Career—this is where we uncover your professional journey and the meaning you've found in work. Careers are rarely linear; we're interested in the choices, the surprises, the satisfactions and struggles. Share the human side: what lit you up, what tested you, what you learned about yourself through labour.
question: What was your first job?

title: Work & Career
question: How did you choose your career path?

title: Work & Career
question: What did you enjoy most about your work?

title: Work & Career
question: Were there any challenges or setbacks?

title: Work & Career
question: Who inspired you in your working life?

title: Work & Career
question: What’s your proudest career achievement?

title: Work & Career
question: How did your work shape your life?

title: Love & Partnership
guidance: Welcome to Session 5: Love & Partnership—this is where we explore intimacy, connection, and the evolution of relationships. Love stories are full of nuance: joy, conflict, growth, compromise. We're looking for honest scenes and reflections rather than idealised summaries.
question: How did you meet your partner(s)?

title: Love & Partnership
question: What drew you to them?

title: Love & Partnership
question: Can you share a memorable story from your relationship?

title: Love & Partnership
question: What have you learned about love?

title: Love & Partnership
question: How did you navigate tough times together?

title: Love & Partnership
question: What advice would you give about relationships?

title: Life’s Highs & Lows
guidance: Welcome to Session 6: Life’s Highs & Lows—this is where we look at the peaks and valleys that define a life. We're interested in moments of pure joy and profound difficulty, and how both shaped your perspective and resilience.
question: What has been your happiest moment?

title: Life’s Highs & Lows
question: Have you faced any major challenges or losses?

title: Life’s Highs & Lows
question: How did you get through difficult times?

title: Life’s Highs & Lows
question: What are you most grateful for?

title: Life’s Highs & Lows
question: Is there a moment you’d relive if you could?

title: Home & Community
guidance: Welcome to Session 7: Home & Community—this is where we explore place, belonging, and the environments that held (or challenged) you. Home is both literal and emotional; communities give us identity and purpose.
question: Where have you lived over the years?

title: Home & Community
question: What does ‘home’ mean to you?

title: Home & Community
question: Are there any communities that have been important to you?

title: Home & Community
question: How have your surroundings shaped your life?

title: Home & Community
question: What makes a place feel like home?

title: Passions & Interests
guidance: Welcome to Session 8: Passions & Interests—this is where we celebrate what lit you up outside of obligation. Hobbies, curiosities, and creative outlets often reveal our truest selves.
question: What hobbies or interests have brought you joy?

title: Passions & Interests
question: How have you spent your free time?

title: Passions & Interests
question: Have you had any unusual or unexpected passions?

title: Passions & Interests
question: Is there something you wish you’d tried?

title: Passions & Interests
question: What advice would you give about following your passions?

title: Values & Beliefs
guidance: Welcome to Session 9: Values & Beliefs—this is where we examine the principles that anchored (or sometimes shifted under) your life. We're interested in how beliefs were formed, tested, and lived.
question: What values have guided your life?

title: Values & Beliefs
question: Have your beliefs changed over time?

title: Values & Beliefs
question: Are there any causes or principles you feel strongly about?

title: Values & Beliefs
question: How do you hope to be remembered?

title: Values & Beliefs
question: What does ‘a good life’ mean to you?

title: Wisdom & Lessons
guidance: Welcome to Session 10: Wisdom & Lessons—this is where you distill what time has taught you. Hard-won insights, simple truths, and advice for those coming after often emerge here.
question: What’s the best advice you’ve ever received?

title: Wisdom & Lessons
question: What lessons have you learned the hard way?

title: Wisdom & Lessons
question: Are there any sayings or philosophies you live by?

title: Wisdom & Lessons
question: What would you tell the next generation?

title: Wisdom & Lessons
question: What is the most important thing you’ve learned?

title: Health & Wellbeing
guidance: Welcome to Session 11: Health & Wellbeing—this is where we explore how you cared for body and mind across the years. Health is both physical and emotional; resilience often grows from how we face limits.
question: How have you looked after your health?

title: Health & Wellbeing
question: Were there any health challenges you’ve faced?

title: Health & Wellbeing
question: What role has wellbeing played in your life?

title: Health & Wellbeing
question: How do you maintain balance and resilience?

title: Health & Wellbeing
question: What advice would you give about health?

title: Legacy & Hopes
guidance: Welcome to Session 12: Legacy & Hopes—this is where we look forward and backward at once: what you leave behind and what you still wish for others.
question: What do you hope your legacy will be?

title: Legacy & Hopes
question: Are there any messages you’d like to pass on?

title: Legacy & Hopes
question: What are your hopes for your family or community?

title: Legacy & Hopes
question: If you could be remembered for one thing, what would it be?

title: Legacy & Hopes
question: Any last words or reflections?

title: Reflections & Then vs. Now
guidance: Welcome to Session 13: Reflections & Then vs. Now—this closing session invites perspective on change, continuity, and the long view. How does the arc of your life look from here?
question: How have you changed over the years?

title: Reflections & Then vs. Now
question: What would your younger self think of you now?

title: Reflections & Then vs. Now
question: Are there things you see differently with age?

title: Reflections & Then vs. Now
question: What’s most important to you now?

title: Reflections & Then vs. Now
question: What are your hopes for the future?
